meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of prevision.
meanings.sent1: The previsional report accurately predicted the upcoming changes.
meanings.sent2: The previsional analysis helped us anticipate future trends.
meanings.sent3: She had a previsional dream that foretold the outcome of the game.
meanings.sent4: His previsional abilities were like having a crystal ball.
meanings.sent5: The previsional nature of the weather forecast made planning easier.

meanings.definition: Providing or serving as a preview or forecast.
meanings.sent1: The previsional brochure gave us a glimpse of the new product.
meanings.sent2: The previsional announcement hinted at what was to come.
meanings.sent3: The previsional trailer for the movie left us eager to watch it.
meanings.sent4: Her previsional insights were like looking into the future.
meanings.sent5: The previsional summary outlined the key points of the presentation.
